title: Encore of Ep. 45: What Are The Odds?
description: This week on Hidden Brain: coincidences. Why they're not quite as magical as they seem, and the reasons we can't help but search for meaning in them anyway.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
